name: REDSHOT Demo
description: Get a taste of thrilling combat, beefy weapons, and deadly bosses in REDSHOT's Beta Demo, available now! After crash landing on a fringe planet in the outer edges of the galaxy, Jack "Goose" Redshot is given a mission to rescue the royal family of the city of Carcosa from a mysterious supernatural invader who has laid siege to the city and it's inhabitants. Explore the first major area and tackle the initial two bosses in this demo, with numerous hidden secrets and powerful weapons to find. The full game will be released Summer 2022!
